GPS parsing with PA1010D and M0

dev board RobotDyn M0 Mini
chip PA1010D
sensor GPS
features UART Google Maps

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Arduino Core for SAMD
  • Adafruit_GPS

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Blinky Arduino M0
  2. GPS PA1010D with Arduino M0

Buy the components

  1. RobotDyn M0 Mini

Code

Download code gps-pa1010d-m0-parsing.ino

Makefile

Prototype

A photo of the actual setup.

Serial console

Serial output from the firmware.

Description

Use GPS module PA1010D with Arduino M0 (SAMD21G) to display parsed GPS data with latitude and longitude in degrees.

Using Google maps to view lat,long

  1. Right click the spot on Google maps
  2. Click “What’s here?”
  3. Click the lat,long in the card at the bottom
  4. View the lat,long data in degrees and decimal at the left sidebar

References

  1. CDTop PA1010D GNSS patch antenna module Datasheet V.03
  2. Adafruit PA1010D breakout board module
  3. Adafruit_GPS
  4. Adafruit GPS Hardware serial parsing
  5. Adafruit GPS Hardware serial timing information
  6. Lat long conversion from degrees to decimal
